components.name: GqJNNZ
components.content:
We need to ask some questions to check you can apply for this funding.

We'll ask about:

  • whether you intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your needs
  • whether you agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • whether your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, supports this submission
  • whether you commit to have proposals in place by March 2025 on how you will spend the funding

pages.title: Do you intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your needs?

components.name: Mhzypt
components.title: Do you intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your needs?
components.hint: This can include your local housing need as a result of the National Planning Policy Framework.

pages.title: Do you agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements?

pages.title: Does your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, support this submission?

components.title: Does your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, support this submission?

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: oAnaAw
components.content:
You’re not eligible to apply for funding because you did not agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements.

If you need help, email the grant team at (email)

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: LpLRZy
components.content:
You’re not eligible to apply for funding because you do not intend to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in your needs.

If you need help, email the grant team at (email)

pages.title: You cannot apply for this funding

components.name: LNXmKd
components.content:
You’re not eligible to apply for funding because your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, does not support this submission.

If you need help, email the grant team at (email)
